title: Blender Pro and Flama
content:
Hi all,

Currently working on a promotional poster for myself... I have purchased Blender Pro as a sort of logotype font for myself, and am looking for something that complements it. I know Blender Pro/Gridnik can read quite well as a body copy font, but I don't really want to detract from the logo.

If you guys have any suggestions about what fonts would complement Blender Pro (yet still differentiate itself), I'd love to hear them. Right now I am playing around with flama light/thin. I like the way it has a more fluid and round (sort of how Blender varies from Gridnik), but thought I'd just try some other things out!

Thanks,  
Ben
author: benski
